concepts.SERUM_GLUCOSE_14_DESC: Laboratory measurement of the glucose level in the blood in mg/ml
concepts.HAEMOGLOBIN_12_DESC: The iron-containing respiratory pigment in red blood cells of vertebrates, consisting of about 6 percent heme and 94 percent globin.
